fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Magical Arsenal: The first time you empty your Hand, draw 3 cards immediately with 2 of them being Attacking cards.
- Ancient Arcana: If you end the phase with no cards in your Hand (including (Satcheled) cards), draw 1 (Satcheled) card at the start of the next phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Combust: Pick a non-Special Attacking card in your Hand. Attack the 2 players next to you on the playerlist with that attack, including modifiers. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]  
- Summon: Draw 1 Special and 1 non-Special card of your choice at the end of this phase. Replaces your regular draw. Cannot be affected by Replenish! [1 use, Unique] 
- Firestrike: Change a card in your Hand into a non-Special Attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [1 uses, Recharging, 0/3]
